fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: MSF-1 successful; Fusaka mainnet fork confirmed Wednesday

critical_infrastructure.highlight: DevP2P 10MB limit blocks 83M gas; EIP-7975 fixes without hard fork

organizational.highlight: SSZ engine API proposed; needs benchmarking before Glamsterdam scoping
BAL/ePBS breakout calls merge into ACDT January 2025

Benchmark SSZ vs JSON for engine API at various blob counts

decisions.decision: ePBS trustless payments decision deferred to ACDC, not Friday breakout
